description:
Hosomichi chases after Yuki to bring her back onto the stage, but she has already given up hope. Yuki can no longer meet the expectations of her fans. However, Hosomichi uses some unknown means to obtain a special item that may be a game-changer.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Mean, I`m an Idol (No Matter What Anyone Says)!
Nantettatte (Dare ga Nanto Iou to) Watashi wa Idol!
なんてったって(誰が何と言おうと)私はアイドル!
